mapper.sql: ID, PROPOSER_NAME, ID_CARD_NO, MOBILEPHONE, RELIEVE_DATE, REASON, ADDTIME, ADDUSERID, STATE, UNIT_NAME, BACK1, BACK2, BACK3
mapper.insert: insert into BASE_BLACKLIST (ID, PROPOSER_NAME, ID_CARD_NO, MOBILEPHONE, RELIEVE_DATE, REASON, ADDTIME, ADDUSERID, STATE, UNIT_NAME, BACK1, BACK2, BACK3) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relieveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{adduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{back1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{back2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{back3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update BASE_BLACKLIST
PROPOSER_NAME = #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ID_CARD_NO = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELIEVE_DATE = #{relieveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ADDUSERID = #{adduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK1 = #{back1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK2 = #{back2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BACK3 = #{back3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update BASE_BLACKLIST set PROPOSER_NAME = #{proposerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD_NO = #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILEPHONE = #{mobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELIEVE_DATE = #{relieveDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDTIME = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ADDUSERID = #{adduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNIT_NAME = #{unitName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK1 = #{back1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK2 = #{back2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BACK3 = #{back3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(*) as listcount FROM BASE_BLACKLIST bak where 1=1
and bak.PROPOSER_NAME like '%'||#{PROPOSER_NAME}||'%'
and bak.UNIT_NAME like '%'||#{UNIT_NAME}||'%'
select from BASE_BLACKLIST where ID_CARD_NO= (select ID_CARD_NO from BASE_PROPOSER where ID=#{id}) and STATE = '1' and SYSDATE < RELIEVE_DATE
